title: The United Mutant Front
fractured_timeline_context: Super mutants from ALL Fallout games exist simultaneously: The Master's Army (FO1), Vault 87 mutants (FO3), Institute FEV mutants (FO4), and Appalachian mutants (FO76). They've realized they're all cousins created by different FEV strains. Now they want to unite.
premise: Marcus (FO2 super mutant companion) has called a summit of all super mutant leaders. Fawkes (FO3), Strong (FO4), Grahm (FO76), and others attend. They're tired of being hunted. They want to create the first Super Mutant Nation. Will you help or hinder them?

stages.name: A Dream of Unity
stages.description: Marcus from Jacobstown has a radical idea: unite ALL super mutants regardless of intelligence level or origin. Recruit peaceful mutants, educate violent ones, create a society.

objectives.text: Recruit Strong (FO4 mutant seeking 'milk of human kindness')
Convince hostile mutant leaders (Speech checks or combat)

stages.name: The Nightkin Question
stages.description: Nightkin (stealth super mutants from FO1/FO:NV) are having psychotic episodes from Stealth Boy addiction. They're attacking the summit. You must cure them or contain them.
choices: Use Vault 77 tech to stabilize them
Exile them (makes summit easier but morally dark)
Accept them as-is (harder but more inclusive)

stages.name: The World Reacts
stages.description: News of a Super Mutant Nation terrifies humans. Brotherhood wants to nuke it. NCR wants to quarantine it. Institute wants to study it. You must negotiate or fight.

player_choice.option2: Broker peace treaty (difficult Speech checks with all factions)
player_choice.option4: Create DMZ where mutants and humans trade but don't mix

ending_mutant_nation.name: The Green Republic
ending_mutant_nation.description: Super Mutant Nation founded. Jacobstown expands into a city-state. Marcus becomes first mutant president.
ending_mutant_nation.gameplay: New mutant vendors, quests, and companions. Some human factions become hostile.

ending_integration.name: One Wasteland
ending_integration.description: Mutants integrate into human society. No separate nation, but equal rights established.
ending_integration.gameplay: Mutant NPCs appear in all towns, mixed-species settlements, reduced faction tensions.

ending_quarantine.name: The Green Zone
ending_quarantine.description: Mutants confined to specific territories. Peaceful but segregated.
ending_quarantine.gameplay: Mutant zones on map, travel restrictions, underground railroad for mutant refugees.

ending_extermination.name: The Final Solution
ending_extermination.description: You helped human factions hunt mutants to near-extinction. Dark ending.
ending_extermination.gameplay: Mutant content removed, huge rewards from BoS/Enclave, karma loss.

cross_timeline_magic: This quest celebrates how EVERY Fallout game created different FEV mutants. Now they all meet and compare origin stories. It's absurd and beautiful.

companion_reactions.fawkes: Overjoyed - finally a chance at mutant dignity
companion_reactions.strong: Confused - is this 'milk of human kindness'?

rewards.unlocks: Super Mutant companions from all games become recruitable
